description.full: The default ability object.
The user fires an small plasma shot at the target to inflict damage.
The user fires an small orb of laser-like energy at any target to inflict damage.
The user rushes across the field until it crashes into the target and explodes to inflict massive damage, destroying itself in the process.
The user throws a tightly packed ball of earth at the target to inflict damage.
The user jumps at the target and tackles it to inflict damage.
The user swiftly jumps up high and then lands on the target to inflict damage.
The user flaps its wings to create a pulse of tachyon particals that seek out the target to inflict damage.
The user throws a decently sized pickaxe at the target to inflict damage.
The user slides across the ground until it crashes into the target to inflict damage.
The user slides across the ground until it crashes into the target to inflict damage.
The user drains life energy from the target to restore its own, inflicting {DAMAGE}% damage in the process.
The user fires an tachyon-based bullet of energy at any target to inflict damage.
The user blasts the target with a powerful gust of air using its fan to inflict damage.
The user dashes across the field until it crashes into the target and explodes to inflict massive damage, damaging itself in the process.
The user throws a massive gear at the target to inflict damage.
The user shoots a large blob of water at the target to inflict damage.
The user slides across the ground toward the target and then springs suddenly inflict damage.
The user summons a large flare that appears by the target and burns them to inflict damage.
The user looses an array of sparks to inflict damage on the target, occasionally hitting benched robots in the process.
The user generates a strong magnetic force that pulls it toward a target to drain {DAMAGE}% of their weapon energy!
The user leaps toward target and punches them with a powerful fist to inflict damage.
The user fires a volley of needles into the air that rains down on random targets to inflict damage.
The user sends a flaming geyser toward the target to inflict damage.
The user sends a frozen pillar toward the target to inflict damage.
The user sends an electric spark toward the target to inflict damage.
The user fires a barrage of sepentine bullets at the target to inflict damage.
The user jumps up high and then lands on a target to inflict damage.
The user generates a powerful top from it's belly and sends it toward the target to inflict damage.
The user generates an intense burst of light that damages the target and lowers their attack by one stage!
The user swims across the field at full speed to crash into the target and inflict damage.
The user shoots its propeller at the target to generate a whirlwind that inflicts damage.
The user glides across the field and crashes into any target to inflict damage.
The users dash across the field at full speed and crashes into the target to inflict damage.
The user generates a large flame and blows it at the target to inflict damage.
The user propels itself across the ground until it crashes into the target to inflict damage.
The user slides and scurries around the ground directly towards the target to inflict damage.
The user fires a tiny skull-shaped bomb at the target that explodes to inflict damage.
The user propels itself across the field until it crashes into the target to inflict damage.  Damage caused by this ability is calculated via the user's defense stat rather of their attack stat.
The user fires a large bone-like canon at the target to deal damage and lower their defense by one stage.

The user generates a crystal fragment that it uses as both a weapon and a shield.  When this ability is first used, a fragment is generated that blocks all attacks.  When the ability is used again, the fragment is thrown at the target for damage.
The user scopes out their target's weak point and fires a sniper shot with perfect precision.  This attack's damage is not affected by the target's position and always results in a critical hit.
The user teleports upwards into the sky and then comes slamming down onto the target for damage!
